CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 28, 1967, pg. 11, reads: First Call For Pipers - These are the ablest members of the 1967 Pittsburgh Pipers personnel - the men upon whom Coach Vince Cazzetta is primarily depending. From left Listening as Coach Cazzetta (holding ball) rattles off their names.  Barry Liebowitz, Chico Vaughn, Ira Harge, Craig Dill, Connie Hawkins, Tom Washington, Charline Williams.  Pipers may have guns with which to take and keep American Basketball Association lead.  Photo was made at Pitt Field House. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Pittsburgh Pipers basketball team: coach Vince Cazzetta, Barry Liebowitz, Chico Vaughn, Ira Harge, Craig Dill, Connie Hawkins, Tom Washington, and Charline Williams, Pitt Field House
